title: Which are the really famous old Russian folk music I can hear online? I have searched them, but not knowing the titles, I am unable to trace, having heard them on audio cassettes long back from an Armenian friend. - Quora

response.answer_text: I can only think of a couple that I know of personally — I wish I knew more; I think it is very moving music Dark Eyes - Old traditional folk song, recorded by many American and International artists, including Frank Sinatra (very famous) Those Were the Days My Friend - a very popular song recorded by Mary Hopkin in the 70s or early 80s. This song is actually copied from a Russian Folk song (circa 1900) - I can’t remember the song’s Russian name
